anya-e0105n18:1_0: Phāhiyannāmena hi cinabhikkhunā 956-buddhavasse sīhaḷadīpato sakkatabhāsāropitaṁ mahisāsakavinayapiṭakañca
anya-e0105n18:1_1: dīghāgamo ca saṁyuttāgamo ca sannipātapiṭakañca attanā saha cinaraṭṭhamānītanti tassa addhānakkamakathāyaṁ dassitaṁ.
anya-e0105n18:1_6: Tathā ‘‘phāhiyambhikkhussa sīhaḷadīpe paṭivasanakāle (954-956-bu-va) mahāvihāre tisahassamattā bhikkhū vasanti,
anya-e0105n18:1_10: te pana dvepi piṭakāni uggaṇhanti mahāyānapiṭakañceva theravādapiṭakañcā’’ti ca teneva cinabhikkhunā dassitaṁ.
anya-e0105n18:2_1: tasmā tasmiṁ vihāre mahāyānikānaṁ padhānācariyabhūtehi assaghosanāgajjunehi kataganthāpi saṁvijjamānāyeva bhaveyyuṁ,
anya-e0105n18:2_2: tatoyeva tesaṁ nayañca nāmañca ācariyabuddhaghosattheropi aññepi taṁkālikā mahāvihāravāsino sutasampannā therā jāneyyuṁyeva.
anya-e0105n18:2_3: Apica dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe samuddasamīpe guntājanapade nāgārajunakoṇḍaṁ nāma ṭhānamatthi,
anya-e0105n18:2_4: yattha nāgajjuno mahāyānikānaṁ padhānācariyabhūto vasanto buddhasāsanaṁ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0105n18:2_7: Tasmāpi ācariyabuddhaghosatthero nāgajjunassa ca assaghosassa ca nayañca nāmañca jāneyyayevāti sakkā anuminituṁ.
anya-e0105n18:3_0: Jānatoyeva pana tesaṁ nayassa vā nāmassa vā attano aṭṭhakathāyamappakāsanaṁ tesaṁ nikāyantarabhāvatoyevassa.
anya-e0105n18:3_1: Tathā hi tesaṁ assaghosanāgajjunānaṁ assaghoso(570-670-buddhavassabbhantare) theravādato bhinnesu ekādasasu gaṇesu sabbatthivādagaṇe pariyāpanno,
anya-e0105n18:3_2: nāgajjuno ca mahāsaṅghika-cetiyavādigaṇādīhi jāte mahāyānanikāye pariyāpanno,
anya-e0105n18:3_3: mahāvihāravāsino ca āditoyeva paṭṭhāya nikāyantarasamayehi asammissanatthaṁ attano piṭakaṁ atīva ādaraṁ katvā rakkhanti,
anya-e0105n18:3_6: Tasmā ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghoso tesaṁ nayaṁ jānantoyeva attano ganthesu nikāyantarasamayehi asammissanatthaṁ nappakāsesī’’ti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0105n18:4_1: jāto brāhmaṇamāṇavo’’tiādinā vuttassa mahāvaṁsavacanassa vicāraṇamukhena ācariyabuddhaghosassa vambhanavacanāni dhammānandakosambinā vuttāni,
anya-e0105n18:4_3: Tathāpi ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghoso bodhimaṇḍasamīpe jāto’’ti etaṁ pana atthaṁ sādhetuṁ daḷhakāraṇaṁ na dissateva ṭhapetvā taṁ mahāvaṁsavacanaṁ,
anya-e0105n18:4_5: tampi mahāvaṁsameva nissāya vuttavacanattā na daḷhakāraṇaṁ hotīti.
